channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Why 2026 Marks the Dawn of Nationwide School Choice
item.description: Trump’s new federal school choice program includes an irresistible pathway for taxpayers to help kids.

item.title: Congress Can Change the Cancer Story with a Vote
item.description: An early-detection blood test, if covered by Medicare, could save money and lives.

item.title: President Trump Can Make the Americas Great Again
item.description: After several years of a U.S. in retreat, the Monroe Doctrine is experiencing a resurgence.

item.title: Reeling Minnesota
item.description: The latest immigration-enforcement-related shooting deserves a credible investigation.

item.title: Save Bayh–Dole’s $2 Trillion Impact on American Innovation
